Title: Relates to special districts for ambulance services and to volunteer firefighter and ambulance services staffing
Summary: Relates to the establishment of special districts for general ambulance services in any county, city, town or village located within the Adirondack park; requires a report on issues of volunteer firefighter and ambulance services staffing.
LawCode: Amd ยง122-b, Gen Muni L; add ยง720, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to the establishment of special districts for general ambulance services within the Adirondack park; and to amend the executive law, in relation to a report on volunteer firefighter and ambulance services staffing
